content: अभिभाविन्, --भाव(वु)क {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Overpowering, defeating, conquering; शोकाभिभाविना भयेनाभिभूता <ls>K. 170</ls> fear which conquered grief. {@--2@} Surpassing, excelling; सर्वतेजोभिभाविना <ls>R. 1. 14</ls>; <ls>Ki. 11. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Disrespecting, humiliating. {@--4@} Attacking.
